instruction: Sit at a table with a pink and a yellow post-it in front of you.
Rest your right hand on the table.
With your right hand, place the pink post-it at the edge of the table away from you.
With your right hand, place the yellow post-it at the edge of the table right in front of you.
Position your right hand on the yellow post-it.
Reach forward with your right hand to touch the pink post-it by extending your elbow.
Return your right hand to the yellow post-it.
Reach forward with your right hand to touch the pink post-it by extending your elbow.
Return your right hand to the yellow post-it.
Rest your right hand on the table.
